None.Name: Bomb Delivery
None.Description: Every 5 seconds, device blasts a bomb dealing 420 damage to enemies in a 10m radius, up to 630 in total. Knocks back small units. Targets need to be at least 10m away. Has an extra long range of 60m.

None.Name: Siege
None.Description: Siege: Deals 50% more damage against structures.
